<small>Aramaic form: [[H4804]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֻטָּה‎</span> [[Ezek.21.20|Ezek 21:20]] textual error, see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרט‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲטֶה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עטה‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲטָפָה‎</span>] see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עטף‎</span>. 

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרַט‎</span>] **verb** ==make smooth, bare, bald; scour, polish== (Late Hebrew ***id.; pull out, off*** (feathers, hair); Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַט‎</span> ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***have little hair***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pluck out hair***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֶמְרְטָה‎</span> [[Ezra.9.3|Ezra 9:3]], suffix 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֶמְרְטֵם‎</span> [[Neh.13.25|Neh 13:25]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרְטָה‎</span> [[Ezek.21.16|Ezek 21:16]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרְטִים‎</span> [[Isa.50.6|Isa 50:6]] ***passive*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרוּטָה‎</span> [[Ezek.21.14|Ezek 21:14]] + 2 t.; — 

**1.** ***make bare*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלכָּֿתֵף מְרוּטָה‎</span> [[Ezek.29.18|Ezek 29:18]] ***every shoulder is laid bare*** (from chafing of burden; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלרֿאֹשׁ מֻקְרָח‎</span>); the cheek (by plucking out beard) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֵּוִי נָתַתִּי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמַכִּים וּלְחָיַי לְמֹרְטִ֑ים‎</span> [[Isa.50.6|Isa 50:6]] with accusative of person <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֶמְרְטֵ֑ם‎</span> [[Neh.13.25|Neh 13:25]] (both acts of violence); of hair and beard <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֶמְרְטָה מִשְּׂעַר ראֹשִׁי וּזֶקָנִי‎</span> [[Ezra.9.3|Ezra 9:3]] (sign of grief). 

**2.** ***scour, polish***, a sword, only [[Ezek.21|Ezek 21]]: v[[Ezra.9.14|Ezra 9:14]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוּחַדָּת‎</span>; [[BDB#Co|Co]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> as Pu), v[[Ezra.9.16|Ezra 9:16]] (strike out [[BDB#Co|Co]]), v[[Ezra.9.33|Ezra 9:33]], + v[[Ezra.9.20|Ezra 9:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרֻטָה‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֻטָּה‎</span> ([[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]]). **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּרֵט ראֹשׁוֺ‎</span> [[Lev.13.40|Lev 13:40]]; [[Lev.13.41|Lev 13:41]] ***his head is made bald*** (by leprosy). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרָ֑טָה‎</span> [[Ezek.21.15|Ezek 21:15]]; [[Ezek.21.16|Ezek 21:16]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמֹרָט‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.45|1Kgs 7:45]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺרָט‎</span> [[Isa.18.27|Isa 18:27]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:52»§ 52</sup> R.6): — ***scoured, polished***, of bronze utensils of temple [[1Kgs.7.45|1Kgs 7:45]] of human skin [[Isa.18.27|Isa 18:27]] of sword [[Ezek.21.15|Ezek 21:15]]; [[Ezek.21.16|Ezek 21:16]] (both + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוּחַדָּה‎</span>, see **Qal** above) 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרִי‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרה‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרִיבַֿ֫עַל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרִיבבַּֿ֫עַל‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ריב‎</span>. I, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרִיבָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ריב‎</span>.
